html:
6.13.20  2:30 am   How would you describe yourself?

      that may be impossible due to conflict of interest

6.13.20  2:24 am   What's the deal with airlines?

      they will attempt to stay afloat

6.13.20  2:01 am   Hey Bill, I've gotten to be pretty good at covering songs that I like on piano. However, the sounds I can create with 2 hands and 1 voice just don't sound as epic as the original song. Is it possible to emulate bass, guitar, drum sounds with just a keyboard and a laptop?

      yes, but, like your piano only version, it will still be different than the other version. but that is the pleasure of songs. just like sentences, there must be 1,000000000 different ways to say each one

6.13.20  1:38 am   if good night is for night, and good day is for day afternoon, etc. Is good time universal?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

6.13.20  1:26 am   what is your iq

      oh a half dozen or so

6.13.20  1:21 am   what made you want to learn 3D animation

      i realized i live in a 3D world

6.13.20  1:16 am   Do you think proper finger placement/stance/whatever is important to focus on when keyboard playing? 

      not if you are ignoring the sound of the notes

6.13.20  12:52 am   in "the Moon is made of Cheese (but i can't taste it)" there are these really nice "ahhhhs" in the background at around 0:47, and i just wanted to say they sound quite cool. really nice in that musical context! why do they sound so cool? is it because you are that cool? 

      i think in that particular example, the chords are to blame

6.13.20  12:49 am   people have been telling me to "think outside the box." but what if i want to table the turns and BOX outside the THINK?

     could be arranged

      perhaps  i n s i d e  the think if i'm feeling a little more ambitious?

     that does not seem any more ambitious than your first suggestion. they both seem to be at an equal level of ambition

6.13.20  12:33 am   Are you ever recognized in public?

      wasn't me

6.13.20  12:21 am   Mt St Helen's is the perfect analogy for these times...how does it feel to be a prophet?

      i thought that was called an analyst

6.13.20  12:19 am   Are you an existentialist?

      i would love to say yes, but the word might have already been claimed by a different movement other than mine

6.13.20  12:05 am   How long do you give yourself to fully record a song? What's the max? 

      i've been aware that sometime around the 2 week mark it becomes dangerously impossible. 2 days would be ideal

6.12.20  11:59 pm   how does lactose effect your gastrointestinal system

      causes interesting sound effects

6.12.20  11:56 pm   What is the proper way to greet someone?

      bestow upon them the origins of our humble universe

6.12.20  11:55 pm   are you going to release many videos soon?

     oh hell yeah

     will there be some kind of a series?

      might take it a step further and do a series of serieses

6.12.20  11:52 pm   How do you keep yourself motivated?

      i don't, what i must do instead is try not to drown in all the motivation which overwhelms me each day

6.12.20  11:50 pm   i could be wrong, but i recall you saying that you're self-taught musically. if so, what was your strategy for learning theory? are there any resources you would recommend for learning theory today?

      it depends whether you mean theory or literacy. i think the 2 are often mixed up. music is so crazy that it's basically your job to try to make theories about how you think it works, and then get your mind blown repeatedly when the music slyly twists and bends to both evade and re-affirm your theory(s). Literacy, on the other hand, is something totally different. that's just knowing how most of the world writes things down, in case you ever want to read or write things to or from other people. that much i'm sure you could learn on google in about 10 seconds (assuming you already are familiar with music), but google wasn't around back when i learned it...... might have been some books lying around, but i picked it up easily (because i was already familiar with music)

6.12.20  11:44 pm   what's a good wisdom

      shapes

6.12.20  11:43 pm   Was your intent on writing "mount St. Helens is about to Blow Up" not to warn us about Mount St. Helens' eventual eruption, but to calm us down and say that it's not a big deal?

     not exactly

     Or is the song telling us not to worry and stay optimistic in times of hardship?

      that would be a great use for a song, and i approve. sounds like something i would do, or at least try to do

6.12.20  11:19 pm   Have you ever ridden a whale

      if i did, it must have been so good i blacked out

6.12.20  10:54 pm   best aspect ratio for a flag?

      16x9

6.12.20  10:50 pm   How can I be a good dad

      for a change of pace, you could try being a mom

6.12.20  10:14 pm   How to you deal with schizophrenia? 

      every time i think i know what schizophrenia is, i am usually informed that it is not that, and it's something different. which fits the theme of schizophrenia quite well, if i understand correctly what it is, which i've been informed that i do not

6.12.20  10:13 pm   how to write in cursive 

      it's best if you make up your own way

6.12.20  10:12 pm   what is your opinion of screaming at the top of your lungs?

      might be some risk of injury

6.12.20  9:58 pm   do you like fluoride cookies

      no but i would be lying if i said cookie wasn't the best flavor of flouride

6.12.20  9:47 pm   when will you be back to making new vids?

      with an impending degree of immediacy and soonness

6.12.20  9:45 pm   can i vote for you for president please

      yes but i won't win

6.12.20  9:40 pm   If a day goes on are there some parts of that day that don't?

      no

6.12.20  9:32 pm   what is the reason behind the Numbers

      to keep track of how many numbers there are

6.12.20  9:25 pm   Do you think languages are real?

      yes

6.12.20  9:24 pm   How can you tell the difference between a tree?

      look in the branches

6.12.20  9:17 pm   How do you manage large projects?

      need procedures. then a larger procedure which says what order to do the procedures in

6.12.20  9:14 pm   Are you making multiple videos/songs right now?

      preparing to

6.12.20  9:04 pm   is it possible to get drunk from working

      yes

6.12.20  9:03 pm   hello. not a question just wanted to say thanks. you and all that you do is a gift from heaven. bye now

      holy afternoon shopping trip, you are very friendly

6.12.20  9:01 pm   what were you like as a kid?

      extremely young

6.12.20  9:01 pm   are children stupid?

      no

6.12.20  9:01 pm   assume that there is a scenario that i need to do an assignment worth a big portion of my grade, also in that hypothetical scenario i had to choose a song to analyse, and also i decided to choose one of your songs, which one do you recommend?

      for song selection, i recommend a hybrid system where you go through the entire list, and make note of ones that you might be excited to do. then, once that list is done, immediately go to random dot org and get a random number selection based on the number of finalists there were

6.12.20  8:43 pm   when did you become aware of your own existence?

     some odd years ago

     were you okay with it?

     sort of, but will admit i had some explaining to do

6.12.20  8:27 pm   How do you get the graphics for your videos?

      we'll see

6.12.20  8:16 pm   I did a bad thing what did I do?

      launched a space ship toward the earth instead of into space

6.12.20  7:47 pm   Who invented art

     could have been you

     and why?

      someone's gotta do it

6.12.20  7:44 pm   Do you plan to share any more songs with us?

      yes, at least double what i have already shared

6.12.20  7:42 pm   what cheese is the best cheese

      slease

6.12.20  6:56 pm   Are you an idiot?

      sort of

6.12.20  6:56 pm   Can you predict the future?

      maybe i will

6.12.20  6:43 pm   how are you so productive?

     how productive am i

     do you have any suggestions on how to be more productive?

     you must be keenly aware of what you would like to produce

6.12.20  6:26 pm   have you considered using an automatic-music-creating-machine to create 1 million songs per second?

      no, that's actually too many for anyone to listen to at that pace
